text: xo brrda phu sraththa xey! Phwk cea xya khid tam thang dein khxng chay dxn læa phu dı tidtam thang deim khxng chay dxn thæcring man ca chı hı thakar lamk læa khwam chaw læa hak michı khwam pordpran khx ngxallxh kæ phwk cea læa khwam metta khxng phraxngkh læw k ca mimi phu dı ley hmu phwk cea brisuththi tæ xallxh thrng hı phu thi phraxngkh thrng prasngkh brisuththi læa xallxh pen phuthrng diyin phuthrng rxbru
